titleStmt.title: A seasonable answer to a late pamphlet entituled, The vindication of Slingsby Bethel, Esq. one of the sheriffs of London and Middlesex / by one who is a citizen of London and an inhabitant of the borough of Southwark.
titleStmt.author: Citizen of London and an inhabitant of the borough of Southwark.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
